vapour 0.0.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Read GDAL geometry as blob

vapour_read_geometry.Rd

Simple read of geometry-only as WKB format.

vapour_read_geometry(dsource, layer = 0L, sql = "")

Arguments

dsource

data source name (path to file, connection string, URL)
layer

integer of layer to work with, defaults to the first (0)
sql

if not empty this is executed against the data source (layer will be ignored)

Format

indicate text output format, available are "json" (default), "gml", "kml", "wkt"

Examples

file <- "list_locality_postcode_meander_valley.tab"
mvfile <- system.file(file.path("extdata/tab", file), package="vapour")
#tib <- tibble::tibble(wkb = vapour_read_geometry(mvfile)) %>%
#  bind_cols(read_gdal_table(mvfile))
pfile <- system.file("extdata/point.shp", package = "vapour")
vapour_read_geometry(pfile)
